text: Patchur, Karaikal is a small revenue village (hamlet). It belongs to the Karaikal taluk, Karaikal district, Puducherry, India. This area is mostly famous for the Sri Dharmasasta Ayyapan Temple. This is the only Ayyapan temple in the Karaikal region. == References == Category:Villages in India Category:Karaikal District Category:Settlements in Puducherry
title: Patchur, Karaikal
